HAVEN`T UPDATED IN LIKE FOREVER ! GETTING REALLY ANNOYED OF POSTING ENTRIES ALL THE TIME SOO YEAH...IM GONNA UPDATE LESS*

My weekend <3

Friday was a blast w/ the girls then saturday and sunday had communions soo was w/ the family the whole day <3

tomorrows school! ughh! but at least I only have to go to school for 32 more days <3!

okayyyy its freakin snowing in the end of APRIL!!! this is like soo bizarre i freakin brought up alll my flip-flops and now i have to go back downstairs and get my winter clothes and uggs and like all my winter shoes! ugggggghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh~! MICHIGAN!!!

<3

leave some comments!

xoxo cortney* <3

ughh i retyped this entry 4 times soo i am not re-typing it again!!!!

woahh haven't updated in like forever!

soo lets get you updated noors birthday was a couple days ago <3 happy birthday hottie i love you soo much its unreal!

well im going to vegas in like a month w. lotz of people and my bestest friend mel`s gonna be there nd most likely my other bestestt friend bianca is coming with us ! yaye! and then schools out in like 8 weeks....can you say woot woot! :0)

yesterday <3

school... yawn

came home. went to subway. picked up  bianca sh. and bianca si. was over her house so yeah went to get my nails done with them and my mom . then went shopping w/ them. then went to dairy queen. then dropped bianca si. off. then dropped bianca sh. off. came home. took a shower. did homework.then slept <3

today <3

school...went to school 3rd hour nd then the day went by pretty fast..but yeah school was pretty boring except lunch was kinda exciting :p wow i want a food fight to happen soooo baddd!!

soo yeah came home.was supposed to go to bianca sh. house but my mom was like no you have to go home w. your brothers which was pretty gay since my dad came home like an hour after we got home! soo yeah anyway bianca si. went over and i think im going over to bianca sh.'s later to do our project for gay mr.long and bianca when you see this call me because your outt right now and i really need to talk to you babe! <3 soo yeah right now just chillen for a bit then probably going some where <3

comment you losers !

xoxo cortney *

wow it feels like saturday ! maybe because

 we have no school tomorrow! woot woot! <3

 welll lets start with yesterday... went to the mall

with my loves BIANCA and MEL bought a couple

of things <3 then went to MEL`s house <3 there

were like all my MARK`s (MEL`s brother) friends

soo yeah chilled with the girls for a little and then

we went outside and played basketball with DEVIN

and BRANDON and ANITA...so yeahh don`t want to

tell you all the details :) today <3 woke up like at 9 woah

only because my mom was like about to spill WATER on

me to wake up for church (yeah i know she is bizarre) soo

 woke up got ready went to church than got a phone call from

BIANCA and thank goodness my phone was on silent soo

yeah got her voicemail after church and she asked if i wanted

to go to the mall soo i said sure soo went to the mall with

 BIANCA and her family it was pretty fun then went out to

eat with them woah you think brothers and sisters fight alot??

then you havent seen KEVIN and BIANCA! woww will you be

 amazed!! soo after i went to her house had alot of funn <3

 i love you soo much babii!!! now i just came home talking online

with people (as usual) and uploading songs onto my ipod :)

anyways ill || write || later leave some COMMENTS for meee!!!!

love you <3 cortney * -<3-

1st off i wanna say wow am i glad its friday!!!!!
today went to school...boring what else is new?
then got home was really bored soo decided

and sisters (they are soo cute!) ahhh

bianca called and we decided to go

went to the play it was really funn
and actually pretty good! good job
everyone! lmfaooo they all got soo 
embarressed bc i kept cheering for

after the play met some girls
lmfaoooo <3 brandon your soo

bumping into the wall when he actually
did it on purpose wow he made it seem 
soo reall couldn`t stop laughing! 
then our fat asses decided to go
to max and ermas too eat ...
so yeah ate there than dropped the 
girlies <3 home *
i was thinking about it
seriously people need to freakin 
have funn in life who cares?!
lifes tooo short! be your self*
dont care what others think either
do the most outragous things ever
give yourself a good character
its more important than ur reputation
oh and another thing i hate when people 
use gods name in vain ( and no i wasnt
doing that right now bc i was preeching it)
seriously even if you do dont lie about it!
just felt like letting it out 
thats what live journals are for right?
oh and someone has been really pissing me 
off lately...rather not say any names*

now <3
drinking chii (boater, i know)
making krissy <3 a new lj bc 
im just tooo nice*
leave me some comments
i love you soo much <3

xoxo~ 

Quote Of The Day-

If you dress nicely, he says you're a snob.
If you dress sexy, he says you're a slut.
If you argue with him, he says you're stubborn.
If you're quiet, he says you're boring.
If you call him, he says you're needy and clingy.
If he calls you, he says you should be grateful.
If you don't love him, he'll try to win you.
If you love him, he'll leave you.
If you don't fuck him, he'll say you don't love him.
If you do, he'll say you're easy.
If you tell him your problems, he'll say you're irritating.
If you don't, he'll say you don't trust him.
If you lecture him, he'll say you're bitchy.
If he lectures you, it's because he "cares."
If you break a promise, you can't be trusted.
If he breaks it, he had to.
If you cheat, you expect it to be over
If he cheats, he expects to be given another chance
Either way us girls never win


<3
